DRMPlugin::AES128ICMDecryptor

 Decrypts ciphertext from in and returns plaintext in out.

Detailed Description

Decrypts data according to AES algorithm (with 128-bit key) in ICM mode.

Decrypts data using byte stream offset.

Definition at line 211 of file ICipher.h.
